text: Tower Hamlets Local Plan 475 INTRODUCTIONSITE ALLOCATIONS BACK TO CONTENTS |Site proposal|Details| ||| |Indicative capacities|2,625 homes (450 on Cuba Street site, 150 on Byng Street/Bellamy Close site, 250 on Britannica hotel site, 650 on Marsh Wall/Manilla Street site, 225 on 54 Marsh Wall site, 500 on Ensign House site, 400 on Beaufort Court site) 1,000 student units (30 Marsh Wall site) 800 co-living units (56-58 Marsh Wall site) 1175 hotel rooms and serviced apartments (225 on Marsh Wall/Manilla Street site, 700 on Quay House site, 250 on Jemstock site)| |Phasing|2024-29, 2030-34|
